message.entry: Mat file {0} could not be opened.
Solver options structure could not be read from the mat file.
Solver options mxArray is not a structure.
Size of solver options structure array is less than the provided index.
Solver cannot be changed from fixed-step solver to variable-step solver.
Integration method for odeN is set to incorrect value ''{0}''. Valid methods are ''ode1'', ''ode2'', ''ode3'', ''ode4'', ''ode5'', ''ode8'', ''ode14x'', and ''ode1be''.
Solver cannot be changed for a differential equation with a mass matrix to an explicit solver.
솔버를 가변 스텝 솔버에서 고정 스텝 솔버로 변경할 수 없습니다.
Dimensions from solver parameter ''{0}'' are inconsistent with continuous state dimension.
Solver parameter ''{0}'' was changed during solver advance. This is not allowed because it can potentially lead to an undefined behavior. Solver parameters must be changed outside advance method.
Solver parameter ''{0}'' cannot be negative or zero.
Fixed-step solver parameter ''{0}'' is being changed, however, the underlying solver is a variable-step solver.
